articles.description: Wanderers arrived at the Wham Stadium to find a note pinned to the dressing room door, addressed to Dion Charles.
articles.content:
Dion Charless old Accrington Stanley team-mates posted a cheeky message to him on the door of the away dressing room before Saturdays 3-2 thriller.
The Bolton striker left the Wham Stadium in Januar… [+1944 chars]

articles.author: Josh O'Brien
articles.title: Man City fans spot moment Jack Grealish "robbed" Erling Haaland of another hat-trick - The Mirror
articles.description: Some Manchester City supporters have spotted a moment during Saturday's win over Brighton that saw Jack Grealish miss a glaring opportunity to hand Erling Haaland a fourth Premier League hat-trick
articles.content:
Some sections of the Manchester City fanbase have been left frustrated by Jack Grealish after he "robbed" Erling Haaland of yet another Premier League hat-trick on Saturday afternoon.
